sentences.sContent: It was once regarded as axiomatic that globalisation would marginalise politics.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was once regarded as axiomatic that globalisation would marginalise politics.
sentences.sCn: 全球化将使政治边缘化在过去曾被当作不言自明的真理。

trans.tranOther: something that is axiomatic does not need to be proved because you can easily see that it is true
